example.context:
DappNode - Shopify Store
Receive Shopify proceeds into your multi-signature wallet.
See Example Integrate Now

DappNode uses the DePay Shopify Plugin to receive payments peer-to-peer, directly into their Gnosis Safe multi-signature wallet. Customers benefit from a seamless payment experience and an on-the-fly token conversion.

Checkout with DePay

After selecting the DappNode of their choice, customers can select DePay upon checkout to pay directly with their Web3 crypto-currency wallet.

DAppNode receives the payment directly into their Gnosis Safe multi-signature wallet.

See Example Integrate Now

interactions.response: DappNode provides customers with the ability to pay with their Web3 crypto-currency wallet directly into the Gnosis Safe multi-signature wallet. Customers can also benefit from an on-the-fly token conversion.
DePay is supported on Shopify, WooCommerce, Wordpress, and other web3 products.

The DEPAY Token is a cryptocurrency token created by DePay AG and used for DePay payments. It is an ERC-20 (Ethereum Request for Comments) token that is used to process payments, donations and other transactions across the DePay network.

responses: DappNode is a platform that allows users to easily deploy and manage decentralized applications (dApps) on their own hardware. It provides a secure, private, and reliable way to run dApps without relying on third-party services. DappNode also provides users with a suite of tools to help them manage their dApps, such as a web-based dashboard, a command-line interface, and a library of pre-configured dApps. Additionally, DappNode offers a marketplace where users can purchase hardware and software to run their dApps.

DappNode is a decentralized platform that allows users to deploy and run Ethereum-based applications on their own hardware. It supports Ethereum, Ethereum Classic, and POA Network, and is compatible with all major operating systems, including Windows, Mac, and Linux. It also supports a wide range of hardware, including Raspberry Pi, Odroid, and Intel NUC.

The DEPAY token is a utility token that unlocks professional tools to manage Web3 Payments and allows token holders to govern the DePay payment protocol. It is currently priced at $0.1906 USD, with a circulating supply of 9,249,775 DEPAY and a market capitalization of $1,763,414 USD. You can buy DEPAY on PancakeSwap and Uniswap V2 and V3. You can also earn DEPAY through the Ecosystem Programs, such as liquidity mining and contributor grants. The DEPAY token also has a token supply schedule, with up to 31'500'000 DEPAY allocated for project development and marketing, up to 7'000'000 DEPAY allocated to the governance treasury, up to 10'000'000 DEPAY allocated to the team governance, and up to 3'200'000 DEPAY allocated to the ecosystem. Finally, up to 10'000'000 DEPAY is reserved for burning due to demand insurance in 2022, and up to 31'000'000 DEPAY is reserved for burning to match utility demand at the end of the vesting period.
